database

Class SQLConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.SQLConnection

  • public class SQLConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for generating queries sent to the database by means of a connection session.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()

        This method is used to connect to a specific database. SQL statements are executed and the results are returned in the context of the connection.

        Returns:
        Connection This returns connection to a specific database.

      • customerLogin

        public long customerLogin(java.lang.String login,
                          java.lang.String password)

        This method is used to pass or not the customer through the login system to his panel.

        Parameters:
        login - This is the parameter specifying the customer login
        password - This is the parameter specifying the customer password
        Returns:
        long This returns id of the customer being logged in.

      • createCustomer

        public boolean createCustomer(java.lang.String firstName,
                              java.lang.String lastName,
                              java.lang.String login,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              java.lang.String repeatedPassword)

        This method is used to creating a new customer.

        Parameters:
        firstName - This is the parameter specifying the customer first name
        lastName - This is the parameter specifying the customer last name
        login - This is the parameter specifying the customer login
        password - This is the parameter specifying the customer password
        repeatedPassword - This is the parameter specifying the customer repeated password by the customer to verify its correctness
        Returns:
        boolean This returns success or failure to create a customer account.

      • getTotalBalance

        public long getTotalBalance(long customerId)

        This method is used returns the available funds on the customer's account.

        Parameters:
        customerId - This is the parameter specifying the customer id in database
        Returns:
        long This returns the available funds on the customer's account.

      • addFundsToYourAccount

        public void addFundsToYourAccount(long customerId,
                                  long funds)

        This method adds a top-up amount to the available funds on the customer's account

        Parameters:
        customerId - This is the parameter specifying the customer id in database
        funds - This is the parameter determining the amount of the top-up amount

      • workerLogin

        public boolean workerLogin(java.lang.String login,
                           java.lang.String password)

        This method is used to pass or not the worker through the login system to his panel.

        Parameters:
        login - This is the parameter specifying the worker login
        password - This is the parameter specifying the worker password
        Returns:
        boolean This returns success or failure to log in into a worker account.

      • createActivity

        public void createActivity(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String type,
                           java.lang.String leader,
                           java.lang.String place,
                           long numberOfFreePlaces,
                           long numberOfOcupiedPlaces,
                           long price,
                           java.lang.String time)

        This method is used to create a new group in the database.

        Parameters:
        name - This is the parameter specifying the name of the group
        type - This is the parameter specifying the type of the group
        leader - This is the parameter specifying the leader of the group
        place - This is the parameter specifying the place where classes take place
        numberOfFreePlaces - This is the parameter specifying the number of free places in the group
        numberOfOcupiedPlaces - This is the parameter specifying the number of ocupied places in the group
        price - This is the parameter specifying the price of enrollment for classes
        time - This is the parameter specifying the time when classes take place
